title: What is the best example of balance in nature? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Moon creating the tidesBees pollinating flowersPlants and Animals providing Oxygen and CO2 for each otherEarth’s subtle tilt on it’s axis during it’s orbit around the sun that provides summer and winterAnimals fertilizing soil and seeding vegetation through droppings

Nature maintains Balance; and there is Perfection about it! Dusk and DawnSummer and WinterHerbivorous and CarnivorousHeart and MindBirth and DeathSun(Hot) and Moon(Cold)Fire and WaterEarth and SkyLight and SoundIn every combination both the parameters needs to co-exist to maintain the perfect Balance.
